A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am not exactly sure how Disney has killed Star Wars (which a lot of people are saying) The movie was great maybe a little slow but good. The Star Wars universe is vast and isn’t all about the Skywalker’s... read some of the books.. this movie was about sacrifice\, redemption\, and growth for multiple characters. Way better then 1\,2\,3 especially 2... i am excited to see what Disney does next. Also Lucas sold the rights and Disney wants to do their own thing like with Spiderman.. so everyone who hasn’t seen it give it a chance and see for yourselves.. don’t let these Debby downers influence you!
